General.Name: Virgin Group Acquisition Corp II
General.Description: Grove Collaborative Holdings, Inc. operates as a plastic neutral consumer products retailer in the United States. It offers household, personal care, beauty, and other consumer products through retail channels, third parties, direct-to-consumer platform, and mobile applications, as well as online store. The company is headquartered in San Francisco, California.
General.Address: 1301 Sansome Street, San Francisco, CA, United States, 94111
